main.description:
Truly spacious at 140 square meters, the Three-Bedroom Suite is the most similar in feel to a private residence, with plenty of room to move about and conduct the affairs of your professional and personal life.

 

Each Three Bedroom suite features a Master’s bedroom with a king-sized bed and its own toilet and bath. The second room is furnished with a queen-sized bed and the third, two single beds, both sharing one bathroom. All bedrooms are furnished with premium hotel amenities.

 

The living area features a lounge sofa, coffee table, cable television and a mini component. Dining and Kitchen facilities include a refrigerator, a cooking stove, complete cooking and dining implements, microwave, and a coffee/tea making facility.
main.features:
• Complimentary WIFI Access
  • In-room dining
  • 300-Thread Count Duvets and Down Pillows
  • Bedside Clock Radio
  • Butler/Nanny Service (Depending on Availability)
  • Cable Programming
  • Coffee/Tea making facility
  • Crockery
  • Glassware
  • Hairdryer
  • In-Room Safe in the Master’s Bedroom
  • Iron and Ironing Board
  • LED Television
  • Microwave and Toaster Oven
  • Multi-line Telephone
  • Refrigerator
